text: Calderdale is a metropolitan borough of West Yorkshire. The population in 2020 was 211,439. It was formed in 1974 by the merger of Brighouse, Elland, Halifax, Sowerby Bridge, Hebden Bridge and Todmorden.HMSO. Local Government Act 1972. 1972 c.70 Calderdale Council is mostly in Halifax, the biggest town. == References == Category:Metropolitan boroughs in West Yorkshire
title: Calderdale
